title: PBE signup website is still down
body:
The PBE signup website is still down because something net "Hextechnically wrong" when are we gonna get that hextechnical fix.

Thanks Rito!

The Mutation

replies.body: Those PBE signups are currently down for maintenance. We're working on making the entire signup process a little smoother, but make sure to check the [**status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) for any updates.
